sourcesContent:
function createBackground(name, color) {
    return `@include create-background(${name}, ${color})`;
}

module.exports = function SassGenerator(variables) {
    return (
        `${ variables.primary ? `$primary: ${variables.primary};` : ''}`.trim() +
        `${ variables.secondary ? `$secondary: ${variables.secondary};` : ''}`.trim() +
        `${ variables.bgName ? `$name: ${variables.bgName};` : ''}`.trim() +
        `${ variables.bgColor ? `$bg: ${variables.bgColor};` : ''}`.trim() +
        `${ variables.enableInverse ? `$enable-inverse: ${variables.enableInverse};` : ''}`.trim() +
        `${ variables.enableDarken ? `$enable-darken: ${variables.enableDarken};` : ''}`.trim() +
        `${ variables.enableLighten ? `$enable-lighten: ${variables.enableLighten};` : ''}`.trim() +
        `${ variables.enableContrast ? `$enable-contrast: ${variables.enableContrast};` : ''}`.trim() +
        `${ variables.enableTrans ? `$enable-trans: ${variables.enableTrans};` : ''}`.trim() +
        `${ variables.enableGray ? `$enable-gray: ${variables.enableGray};` : ''}`.trim() +
        `@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/index';`.trim() +
        `@include create-background(${variables.bgName}, ${variables.bgColor});`.trim() +
        `${variables.components === "all" ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/all';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.select2 ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/select2';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.datepicker ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/datepicker';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.navbar ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/navbar';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.carousel ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/carousel';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.alert ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/alert';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.badge ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/badge';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.breadcrumb ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/breadcrumb';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.buttonGroup ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/button-group';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.buttons ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/buttons';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.card ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/card';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.code ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/code';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.customForms ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/custom-forms';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.forms ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/forms';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.dropdown ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/dropdown';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.inputGroup ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/input-group';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.jumbotron ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/jumbotron';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.listGroup ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/list-group';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.media ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/media';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.modal ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/modal';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.nav ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/nav';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.pagination ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/pagination';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.popover ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/popover';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.progress ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/progress';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.tables ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/tables';" : ""}`.trim() +
        `${variables.components !== "all" && variables.tooltip ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/tooltip';" : ""}`.trim()
    );
}
